description: This file defines React functional components for rendering loading skeleton UI placeholders, including list, table, and card variants.

methods.name: SkeletonLine({ w = "100%", h = 12 })
methods.description: A functional component rendering a single skeleton line with customizable width and height.

methods.name: SkeletonTable({ rows = 6, cols = 4 })
methods.description: A component rendering a skeleton placeholder for a table with specified number of rows and columns.

methods.name: SkeletonCards({ cards = 3 })
methods.description: A component rendering a set of card-like skeleton placeholders.

methods.name: LoadingSkeleton({ rows = 6, variant = "list", label = "Loading" })
methods.description: Main exported component providing different variants ('list', 'table', 'cards') of loading skeleton placeholders.

ctags.name: LoadingSkeleton
ctags.pattern: /^export default function LoadingSkeleton({ rows = 6, variant = "list", label = "Loading" }) {$/
